name: Lone Samurai
description:
I worked on this part time in 2017 and 2018, but the scope was too big and I ended up scrapping it and working on Dragon Creek instead.

A lot of the assets and code from this would later be edited and ported over to Dragon Creek. 

The goal was to make a large 2D samurai sidescroller with fantasy elements. It was largely inspired by the final season of samurai jack that was released at the time.

Right now you can jump, block, and attack. Use WASD to move, left click to attack, and right click to block.

I think it would a lot of fun to revisit this concept, but I can't see myself ever having the time. Bit of a shame, as this world was pretty cool.
